author: deffrian
content:
Hi guys, I'm working on EIP-7002 implementation for Nethermind client. I have few questions.
1. As I understand it's planned to change spec to something similar to 4788.  With system transactions and get/set semantics. Am I right?
2. If I'm not wrong I heard that someone have the precompile bytecode. Get I get it for testing?
Thank you!

author: lightclient
content:
i started the 7002 impl here https://github.com/lightclient/7002asm
it doesn't work yet, but most of the code is there
